Year.definition: The year in which the data was collected or pertains to. It indicates the NFL season.

name.definition: The full name of the football player featured in the data sample.

position.definition: The position that the player occupies on the football field, such as Running Back (RB) or Wide Receiver (WR).

team.definition: The official abbreviation of the National Football League (NFL) team for which the player plays, e.g., ARI for Arizona Cardinals.

adp.definition: The Average Draft Position (ADP) represents the average spot at which the player is drafted in fantasy football leagues.

PlayerID.definition: A unique identifier for the player, typically a combination of their last name and initials, used for database and tracking purposes.

Employee_Name.definition: The full name of the employee, typically in 'Last Name, First Name' format.

EmpID.definition: A unique numerical identifier assigned to each employee within the organization.

MarriedID.definition: A binary indicator (1 or 0) showing whether the employee is married (1) or not married (0).

MaritalStatusID.definition: A numerical code representing the employee's marital status (e.g., single, married, divorced, etc.).

GenderID.definition: A numerical code indicating the gender of the employee (e.g., 1 for male, 0 for female, etc.).

EmpStatusID.definition: A numerical code that signifies the employment status of the individual (e.g., active, terminated, resigned, etc.).

DeptID.definition: A unique numerical identifier for the department in which the employee works.

PerfScoreID.definition: A numerical code that represents the employee's performance score based on performance reviews.

FromDiversityJobFairID.definition: A binary indicator (1 or 0) showing whether the employee was recruited through a diversity job fair.

Salary.definition: The current annual salary or pay of the employee, usually represented in monetary units.

Termd.definition: A binary indicator (1 or 0) indicating whether the employee is terminated (1) or not (0).

PositionID.definition: A unique numerical identifier for the specific position or job title the employee holds.

Position.definition: The job title or designated position of the employee within the company.

State.definition: The U.S. state in which the employee resides or where they are based for work.

Zip.definition: The postal zip code associated with the employee's primary residence or work location.

DOB.definition: Date of Birth of the employee, typically formatted as MM/DD/YYYY.

Sex.definition: The sex of the employee, typically represented as 'M' for male or 'F' for female.

MaritalDesc.definition: A descriptive term for the employee's marital status, such as Single, Married, Divorced, etc.

CitizenDesc.definition: A description of the employee's citizenship status or nationality.

HispanicLatino.definition: A binary indicator (1 or 0) representing whether the employee identifies as Hispanic/Latino (1) or not (0).

RaceDesc.definition: The race or ethnicity description of the employee (e.g., White, Black, Asian, etc.).

DateofHire.definition: The date the employee was hired by the organization, formatted as MM/DD/YYYY.

DateofTermination.definition: The date the employee's employment was terminated, if applicable, formatted as MM/DD/YYYY.

picklist: Learned that he is a gangster
TermReason.definition: The reason for employment termination, such as Resignation, Termination, Retirement, etc.

EmploymentStatus.definition: The current employment status of the employee (e.g., Full-Time, Part-Time, Suspended, Terminated, etc.).

Department.definition: The name of the department within the organization where the employee works.

ManagerName.definition: The full name of the employee's manager or supervisor.

ManagerID.definition: A unique numerical identifier assigned to the employee's manager or supervisor.

RecruitmentSource.definition: The source through which the employee was recruited, such as Internal, Agency, Job Fair, etc.

PerformanceScore.definition: The score or rating given to the employee during their latest performance review, often on a fixed scale.

EngagementSurvey.definition: The employee's engagement score derived from an organizational survey, indicating their level of engagement.

EmpSatisfaction.definition: An index score representing the employee's level of satisfaction with their job and work environment.

SpecialProjectsCount.definition: The number of special projects the employee is currently involved in or has completed.

LastPerformanceReview_Date.definition: The date of the employee's last performance review, formatted as MM/DD/YYYY.

DaysLateLast30.definition: The number of days the employee has been late to work in the past 30 days.

Absences.definition: The number of times the employee has been absent from work, recorded over a specific time period.

position.definition: Position played by the player, e.g., WR for Wide Receiver.

team.definition: Team abbreviation representing which team the player belongs to, e.g., TEN for Tennessee Titans.

season.definition: Season year in which the game was played, e.g., 2019.

week.definition: Week number in the football season, indicating the specific game week.

season_type.definition: Type of the season, e.g., REG for regular season.

opponent_team.definition: Team abbreviation for the opponent team faced in the particular game.

completions.definition: Number of passes successfully caught by receivers from this player.

attempts.definition: Number of passing attempts made by the player in the game.

passing_yards.definition: Total number of yards gained by passing plays executed by the player.

passing_tds.definition: Number of touchdowns made from passing plays.

interceptions.definition: Number of interceptions thrown by the player during the game.

sacks.definition: Number of times the player was tackled behind the line of scrimmage while attempting to pass.

sack_yards.definition: Total yards lost by the player when sacked.

sack_fumbles.definition: Number of fumbles committed by the player when sacked.

sack_fumbles_lost.definition: Number of fumbles lost by the player when sacked.

passing_air_yards.definition: Total yards gained by the player before the ball was caught by a receiver.

passing_yards_after_catch.definition: Total yards gained by a receiver after catching a pass from the player.

passing_first_downs.definition: Number of first downs achieved by the player's passing plays.

passing_2pt_conversions.definition: Successful two-point conversions achieved by passing.

carries.definition: Number of rushing attempts by the player.

rushing_yards.definition: Total yards gained by the player from rushing attempts.

rushing_tds.definition: Number of touchdowns scored from rushing plays.

rushing_fumbles.definition: Number of fumbles by the player while rushing.

rushing_fumbles_lost.definition: Number of fumbles lost by the player while rushing.

rushing_first_downs.definition: Number of first downs achieved by the player from rushing attempts.

rushing_2pt_conversions.definition: Successful two-point conversions achieved by rushing.

receptions.definition: Number of receptions made by the player.

targets.definition: Number of times the player was targeted with passes.

receiving_yards.definition: Total yards gained when the player caught passes.

receiving_tds.definition: Number of touchdowns scored from receiving plays.

receiving_fumbles.definition: Number of fumbles by the player during receiving.

receiving_fumbles_lost.definition: Number of receiving fumbles lost by the player.

receiving_air_yards.definition: Total yards the ball traveled in the air toward the player before being caught.

receiving_yards_after_catch.definition: Yards gained after the player caught the pass.

receiving_first_downs.definition: Number of first downs achieved by the player's receiving plays.

receiving_2pt_conversions.definition: Successful two-point conversions achieved by the player by receiving.

target_share.definition: Percentage of team's total targets directed at the player.

air_yards_share.definition: Percentage of team's total air yards targetted at the player.

fantasy_points.definition: Fantasy points generated by the player in standard scoring systems.

fantasy_points_ppr.definition: Fantasy points generated by the player in points per reception (PPR) leagues.

total_yards.definition: Total yards gained by the player combining all methods (passing, rushing, receiving).

ypa.definition: Yards per attempt, calculated by dividing total yards by the number of attempts.

ypc.definition: Yards per carry, indicating rushing yards divided by total carries.

ypr.definition: Yards per reception, average yards gained for each catch.

touches.definition: Total number of times the player handled the ball (rushing attempts + receptions).

count.definition: Frequency or number of items/events related to the player.

pass_td_percentage.definition: Percentage of passing touchdowns relative to total pass attempts.

int_percentage.definition: Interception percentage relative to pass attempts.

rush_td_percentage.definition: Percentage of rushing touchdowns relative to rushing attempts.

rec_td_percentage.definition: Percentage of receiving touchdowns relative to receptions.

total_tds.definition: Total touchdowns scored through all types of plays.

td_percentage.definition: Percentage of total touchdowns relative to all touches.

passer_rating.definition: A measurement of the player's passing performance efficiency.

rookie_season.definition: Year in which the player started his first professional season.

college.definition: Name of the college or university where the player played before joining the professional league.

weight.definition: Player's weight usually represented in pounds or kilograms.

birth_date.definition: Date of birth for the player, indicating player’s age.

rookie_age.definition: Age of the player during their rookie season.

height_ft.definition: Player's height in feet and inches.

round.definition: Draft round in which the player was selected.

overall.definition: Overall draft pick number when the player was selected.

forty.definition: Time in seconds recorded for the player to run forty yards, measured at the NFL combine or pro day.

bench.definition: Number of repetitions the player completed in the 225-pound bench press test at the NFL combine or pro day.

vertical.definition: Vertical jump measurement in inches performed at the NFL combine or pro day.

index.definition: An indexing measure often used to mark unique entries or observations.

offense_snaps.definition: Number of offensive plays or snaps the player was involved in during a game.

teams_offense_snaps.definition: Total number of offensive snaps played by the player's team during the game.

offense_pct.definition: Percentage of offensive plays (snaps) the player participated in during the game.

years_played.definition: Number of professional years the player has participated in up until the specified season.
